20101226141725.000|20101226141725.000|CC1|  Cymbalta can help with many   
20101226141725.000|20101226141728.000|CC1|    symptoms of depression.     
20101226141728.000|20101226141728.000|CC1| Tell your doctor right away if 
20101226141728.000|20101226141731.000|CC1|    your depression worsens,    
20101226141731.000|20101226141731.000|CC1|  you have unusual changes in   
20101226141731.000|20101226141734.000|CC1|behavior or thoughts of suicide.
20101226141734.000|20101226141734.000|CC1|  Antidepressants can increase  
20101226141734.000|20101226141734.000|CC1| these in children, teens, and  
20101226141734.000|20101226141737.000|CC1|         young adults.          
20101226141737.000|20101226141737.000|CC1|  Cymbalta is not approved for  
20101226141737.000|20101226141740.000|CC1|       children under 18.       
20101226141740.000|20101226141740.000|CC1|     People taking MAOIs or     
20101226141740.000|20101226141742.000|CC1|          thioridazine          
20101226141742.000|20101226141742.000|CC1| or with uncontrolled glaucoma  
20101226141742.000|20101226141745.000|CC1|   should not take Cymbalta.    
20101226141745.000|20101226141745.000|CC1|   Taking it with NSAID pain

20101226141746.000|20101226141749.000|CC1|    increase bleeding risk.     
20101226141749.000|20101226141749.000|CC1|  Severe liver problems, some   
20101226141749.000|20101226141751.000|CC1|     fatal, were reported.      
20101226141751.000|20101226141751.000|CC1|Signs include abdominal pain and
20101226141751.000|20101226141755.000|CC1| yellowing of the skin or eyes.
